qualifications.title: Safety Management Certification
qualifications.description: The Safety Management Certification certification is issued to companies operating in the Safety field by Buildings Department, HKSAR Government.

qualifications.title: General Building Contractor
qualifications.description: The General Building Contractor certification is issued to companies operating in the General field by Construction Industry Council.

qualifications.title: Specialist Contractor (Concrete)
qualifications.description: The Specialist Contractor (Concrete) certification is issued to companies operating in the Specialist field by Hong Kong Institute of Architects.

qualifications.title: Specialist Contractor (Earthworks)
qualifications.description: The Specialist Contractor (Earthworks) certification is issued to companies operating in the Specialist field by Buildings Department, HKSAR Government.

qualifications.title: Specialist Contractor (Foundation)
qualifications.description: The Specialist Contractor (Foundation) certification is issued to companies operating in the Specialist field by Construction Industry Council.
